name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website Time Tracker - Easily track your browsing Activity

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time spent on different websites in real-time and give day to day insights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online habits with Website Time Tracker! This extension allows you to effortlessly monitor the time you spend on various websites, helping you become more mindful of your browsing activities.

⭐ Easy Tracking: Automatically records the time spent on each site, providing you with a detailed overview of your online behavior.
⭐ User-Friendly Dashboard: Access a clean and intuitive interface that displays your browsing statistics at a glance.
⭐ Data Privacy: Your browsing data remains private; no external servers are used, ensuring your information stays secure.
⭐ Improve Productivity: Identify time-wasting habits and make informed decisions about your online activities.

With Website Time Tracker, you can gain valuable insights into your internet usage, leading to better time management and increased productivity!
